parties.raw_snippet:
This OUTSOURCING AGREEMENT (this “Agreement”) is made and entered into as of the 16th day of May, 2017, by and among
Photronics, Inc., a Connecticut corporation with its principal place of business at 15 Secor Road, Brookfield, Connecticut, U.S.A
(“Photronics”),
Dai Nippon Printing Co., Ltd., a Japanese corporation with its principal place of business at 1-1, Ichigaya Kagacho 1-chome,
Shinjuku-ku, Tokyo, Japan (“DNP”),
Photronics DNP Photomask Corporation, a company limited by shares organized and formed under the Company Act of the
Republic of China with its principal place of business at 4f, #2, Li-Hsin Road, Science Park, Hsinchu, Taiwan, ROC (“PDMC”), and
Xiamen American Japan Photronics Mask Co., Ltd., a limited liability company organized and formed under the People’s Republic
of China with its principal place of business at R203-95, South Building of Torch Square, No. 56-58 Torch Road, Gaoxin District, Xiamen, Fujian
Province, Peoples Republic of China (the “Company").
parties.reasoning: The paragraph beginning "This OUTSOURCING AGREEMENT... by and among" explicitly lists the contracting parties and identifies each by name and a short description; those are the main parties to the agreement.
normalized_value: Xiamen American Japan Photronics Mask Co., Ltd.

contract_type.raw_snippet:
OUTSOURCING AGREEMENT
This OUTSOURCING AGREEMENT (this “Agreement”) is made and entered into as of the 16th day of May, 2017,
contract_type.reasoning: The document title is "OUTSOURCING AGREEMENT" and the substantive provisions govern suppliers providing Products to the Company under purchase orders, allocation rules, pricing, delivery and warranties — i.e., an outsourcing/supply of manufacturing/production relationship.

agreement_date.raw_snippet: This OUTSOURCING AGREEMENT (this “Agreement”) is made and entered into as of the 16th day of May, 2017,
agreement_date.reasoning: The clause "is made and entered into as of the 16th day of May, 2017" is the explicit signing/making date of the agreement in the contract header.

effective_date.raw_snippet: This OUTSOURCING AGREEMENT (this “Agreement”) is made and entered into as of the 16th day of May, 2017,
effective_date.reasoning: No separate "Effective Date" definition with a different calendar date is provided; the header states the agreement was made and entered into as of May 16, 2017, which functions as the effective/execution date.

expiration_date.raw_snippet:
This Agreement shall become effective as of the Effective Date and shall continue to be in full force and effect for so long as
Photronics and DNP, or any of their Affiliates, each remains a Shareholder of the Company.
expiration_date.reasoning: Article 7.1 sets the term: the agreement continues while Photronics and DNP (or their affiliates) remain shareholders — a relative, condition-based term rather than a fixed calendar end date.
expiration_date.normalized_value: shall continue to be in full force and effect for so long as Photronics and DNP, or any of their Affiliates, each remains a Shareholder of the Company.

governing_law.reasoning: There is no explicit governing law or choice-of-law clause in the provided text; the contract incorporates Section 12 of the China JV Operating Agreement by reference, but this document does not itself state a governing jurisdiction.

notice_period.reasoning: The contract does not contain an advance notice-to-prevent-automatic-renewal provision or any auto-renewal language; term is tied to shareholding rather than renewal by notice.

renewal_term.reasoning: No automatic renewal clause or specific renewal term is stated in the agreement; continuation is conditional on shareholding status rather than periodic renewal.
